title: Hot 2 Bed Right in Davis! Central AC, Parking, In UNit Laundry! 178563
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts - Porter Square', 'Davis / Porter Sq - Modern 2 Bed Condo with Parking - 3 Mins to T', 'Somerville / Davis Square / Porter Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#178563', 'Apartment Summary', 'Gorgeous 2 bedroom condo apartment on the 3rd floor of a 3 unit building in Davis Square within a 3 minute walk to the T.', 'This unit features hardwood floors, laundry in the unit, central air and 1 off street parking spot is included.', '  (Reference #178563)', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Davis Square', 'Kitchen:', 'Open Concept.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove, Dishwasher, Garbage Disposal.', 'Reference:', '#178563', 'Bath:', '1', 'Features', '3 minute walk to the T.', 'Three-Family structure, Wood Frame architecture, on the 3rd floor, 827 square feet.', 'Washer in unit, Dryer in unit, Cable Ready, Central.', 'Off Street Parking Available.', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Ryan Moore', 'Call:', '860-519-3644', 'Please mention reference #', '178563', 'Email:', 'ryan.moore @ <URL>', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', '** Pictures are of model unit, and furnished appliances may vary.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
